body: ~~You can't factor the body of the loop, it uses a short-circuiting `return`. (Or, you can factor it out, but you still have to test the return value to decide to return.)~~ OK, I see what you mean. Doing it.
body_html: You can't factor the body of the loop, it uses a short-circuiting return. (Or, you can factor it out, but you still have to test the return value to decide to return.) OK, I see what you mean. Doing it.
